original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
This role blends strategic business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to deeply understand complex business processes and seamlessly translate them into effective system configurations. As a key player, you will be responsible for ensuring our systems accurately reflect evolving business needs and operate at peak efficiency. This position will focus heavily on developing innovative processes and leveraging cutting-edge technologies like machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to quickly deliver impactful solutions within the vehicle configuration space.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with cross-functional stakeholders to thoroughly understand business requirements, document them using industry-standard techniques, and clearly communicate them to technical teams.
- Translate business needs into comprehensive technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, and implementing and testing new configurations.
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, leveraging data querying, reporting, and visualization tools to drive data-informed decisions.
- Proactively identify opportunities to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through innovative configuration changes and the application of best practices.
- Rigorously test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function seamlessly, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) processes.
- Maintain meticulous documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to enable smooth implementation and ongoing support.
- Forge strong partnerships with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to facilitate the successful implementation and continuous improvement of system configurations.

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving abilities, with a keen eye for identifying and resolving complex technical challenges.
- Outstanding communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, with a proven track record of translating intricate technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.
- Demonstrated proficiency in business process analysis and requirements gathering, with the ability to effectively document and communicate findings.
- Hands-on experience in SQL and data manipulation, with the ability to leverage data insights to drive strategic decision-making.

Preferred Skills:
- Proficiency in Java programming language and its application in enterprise-level systems.
- Experience with Agile methodologies and their implementation in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration systems and the unique challenges and requirements of the automotive industry.

Required Experience:
- Proven track record of successfully implementing machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) solutions to drive business value.
- Hands-on experience in translating business requirements into technical configurations and maintaining system integrity.

Preferred Experience:
- Experience working in an Agile environment and collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver innovative solutions.
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration systems and the ability to leverage this knowledge to enhance business processes and system efficiency.

Required Tools:
- Proficiency in utilizing data querying, reporting, and visualization tools to extract insights and drive data-driven decision-making.
- Familiarity with project management and collaboration tools to ensure effective coordination and communication across teams.
- Experience in working with enterprise-level systems and configuration management tools to maintain the integrity and traceability of system changes.

This role presents a unique opportunity to blend your strategic business acumen with cutting-edge technical expertise, enabling you to drive transformative change within our organization. As a key member of the team, you will be responsible for deeply understanding complex business processes and seamlessly translating them into highly efficient system configurations that align with evolving needs. Your role will focus on developing innovative solutions that leverage the power of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to deliver tangible, measurable improvements within the vehicle configuration space.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate extensively with cross-functional stakeholders to gather comprehensive business requirements, utilizing industry-standard techniques such as user stories, use cases, and process flows to document and communicate them effectively.
- Leverage your technical proficiency to translate business needs into robust, scalable system configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including designing and maintaining configuration specifications, implementing complex data mappings and integrations, and thoroughly testing new configurations.
- Analyze existing data using advanced querying, reporting, and visualization tools to uncover trends, identify inefficiencies, and pinpoint opportunities for process optimization and system enhancement.
- Proactively identify areas for improvement and spearhead the development of innovative configuration changes and best practices that streamline business operations and enhance system performance.
- Rigorously validate configurations to ensure they meet or exceed requirements, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) processes and providing detailed feedback to drive continuous improvement.
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps, serving as a subject matter expert and facilitating smooth implementation and ongoing support.
- Foster strong collaborative relationships with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure seamless integration and continuous optimization of system configurations.

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving abilities, with a demonstrated track record of tackling complex technical challenges and delivering impactful solutions.
- Outstanding communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, with the proven ability to translate intricate technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.
- Proficiency in business process analysis and requirements gathering, with the ability to effectively document and communicate findings using industry-standard techniques.
- Hands-on experience in SQL and data manipulation, with the ability to leverage data-driven insights to inform strategic decision-making.
- Familiarity with Java programming language and its application in enterprise-level systems.

Preferred Skills:
- Experience with Agile methodologies and their successful implementation in a dynamic, fast-paced environment.
- Knowledge of vehicle configuration systems and the unique challenges and requirements of the automotive industry.
- Proficiency in the application of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) techniques to drive business value.

Required Experience:
- Demonstrated expertise in translating business requirements into technical configurations and maintaining system integrity within complex enterprise-level environments.
- Hands-on experience in implementing and optimizing machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) solutions to address business needs.

Preferred Experience:
- Track record of working in an Agile environment and collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver innovative, customer-centric solutions.
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration systems and the ability to leverage this knowledge to enhance business processes and system efficiency.

Required Tools:
- Proficiency in utilizing advanced data querying, reporting, and visualization tools to extract insights and drive data-informed decision-making.
- Experience in working with enterprise-level project management and collaboration tools to ensure effective coordination and communication across teams.
- Familiarity with configuration management tools and best practices to maintain the integrity and traceability of system changes.
This role presents a unique opportunity
